title: Problem-Solving-Based Social Studies Curriculum for Personalized Learning Support

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Science Concepts and Fundamental Digital Device Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Designing blended learning models feasible in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social problem scenarios, extract core concepts, and diagram interconnections between concepts.
Learners can select personalized learning materials reflecting their cognitive schemas with over 80% accuracy during problem-solving processes.
Learners can improve their problem-solving strategies 3+ times through peer assessment and formative evaluation.

resources: QR Code Quizzes for Formative Assessment
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
